page.shortlink: api desktop api control panel object set focus function
page.description: The CONTROLPANEL.SETFOCUS() method sets focus to the selected control panel object.

argument.name: objectname
argument.description: The name of a Control Panel object.

argument.name: classname
argument.description: Optional. The name of class of objects. The following values are available.

section.note: You must have something already selected on the same Control Panel tab window for the function to work.
